paper_abstract: We present ail algorithm to compute the Wedderburn decomposition of semisimple group algebras based Oil a computational approach of the Brauer-Witt theorem. The algorithm was implemented in the GAP package wedderga. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An algorithm to compute the Wedderburn decomposition of semisimple group algebras implemented in the GAP package wedderga
